page.title: 12Housing in Uxbridge
page.content: There are many types of housing in our area such as detatched,semi-detatched, terraced and council accommadation.In Rockingham Parade there are houses that date back to the previous century,whereas in Station Road there are houses that are 50 years old.There have also been houses built in the last 5 years.Some Council houses are not in very good condition,such as those in Sefton Way,and they are only 14 years old.This is a typical description of a house in our area.It is semi-detatched,with a lounge,dining room and fitted kitchen.It has 3 bedrooms and bathroom with a seperate W.C.There is gas central heating fitted,a large garden and garage.It would cost about Â£50,000.
